esema ema tharagayedi indiya pile ashish nerage awasan pandu oowarayedi haye paharak saha hathare pahara dekak samangin dakunu api්rakanuwan tharagaya jaya ganima krida lolayinta imahath aashwadajanaka dasunak wiya.ese anapekshitha parajayakata lakwuwada lowa supiri pithikaru sachin thendulkar thama ekdina tharaga diwiye 48 wani shathakaya da labamin loka kusalana krikat tharagawaliye me dakwa thaba siti thama suwishesha warthawa aluth karamin lakunu 2120 k dakwa thama paudgalika lakunu sankhyawa krikat ithihasayata ekkirimata samath wiya.shri lankawa saha simbabwe samanga pawathi tharagayedi shri lanka pile aarambhaka pithikaruwan dedena lesa upul tharanga (133) saha thilakarathna dilshan (144) labagath lakunu sankhyawath owun dedena wisin goda nangu lakunu 282 sambandhathawayath age kala yuthu pithiharambaayak wiya.
